short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate male delusion based on various factors!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Male Delusion & Reality Calculator: A Reality Check for Men & Women. 

This extension is for Male Delusion Calculator only. So if you are a male and want to know possibility of your ideal women. Then do settings of your desire and Hit 'Calculate' button.

Then you will see results like this:

----------------------------

MY IDEAL WOMEN:

According to statistical data, the probability of a woman.

Female population meets your standards is 23.75%.

Roughly 40,137,500 women in US meet your ideal woman standards.

----------------------------

We have similar calculator for female on our website. Women can also use it for calculating the possibility of their ideal man and get rid of their delusions about dream man.

PLEASE SUGGEST MORE IDEAS & IMPROVEMENTS YOU WOULD Like to see.

Thanks
